html: As anciently Jehovah manifested himself to Moses and the seventy elders on Mount Sinai (Exodus 24:9-11 ), and as Moses witnessed his glory (Exodus 24:15-18 ), so when he comes to reign on the earth Jehovah manifests himself to his end-time elders in the two spiritual and political centers of Mount Zion and Jerusalem. During the earth’s millennial age of peace, Jehovah sends emissaries to those who survive his Day of Judgment so that they may likewise receive the chance to see his glory: “I will come to gather all nations and tongues, that they may approach and behold my glory” (Isaiah 66:18 ).
